TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsAuthenticationModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule
Public NotInheritable Class WindowsAuthenticationModule Implements IHttpModule
public ref class WindowsAuthenticationModule sealed : System::Web::IHttpModule

summary.span: 启用 Windows 身份验证的情况下设置 ASP.NET 应用程序用户的标识。

span.span: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when Windows authentication is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当身份验证设置为、设置属性的当前到表示为当前请求的 IIS 提供的 Windows 标识的对象。When the authentication is set to , the sets the property of the current to an object that represents the Windows identity supplied by IIS for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则使用返回的标识方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the uses the identity returned by the method. 公开使你可以提供自定义的事件对象属性的当前。The exposes an event that enables you to provide a custom object for the property of the current . 事件可通过指定一个名为子例程**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。The event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 在 IIS 7.0 中，使用类，该类具有不支持类。In IIS 7.0, using the class with the class is not supported. 有关在集成模式下的兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅[从 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序迁移到 IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 调用此构造函数可创建的实例类。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 后调用的构造函数，它调用方法以初始化新对象。After calling the constructor, it calls the method to initialize the new object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Authenticate As WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler

summary.span: 应用程序对当前请求进行身份验证时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间引发事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 你可以访问事件类通过指定一个名为子例程**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 你可以使用属性对象提供给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值期间属性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，Windows IIS 提供的标识用作当前请求的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则属性设置为返回的标识方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property is set to the identity returned by the method. **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**引发事件时，才身份验证设置为和是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. > [!NOTE] > 在中集成模式下运行的 IIS 7.0 中事件则不会引发时这两个 ASP.NET和 IIS`AnonymousAuthenticationModule`模块均已启用。In IIS 7.0 running in Integrated Mode, the event of the is not raised when both the ASP.NET and the IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` modules are enabled. 在此方案中，若要接收身份验证通知，订阅事件实例。In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the event of the instance. 有关在集成模式下的兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅[从 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序迁移到 IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法可确保包含在处理事件。The method ensures that the is included in the processing of the event.
